CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( BANT_Score__c =0, "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF( BANT_Score__c >0 && BANT_Score__c <= 30 , "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF( BANT_Score__c >30 && BANT_Score__c <= 60, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF( BANT_Score__c >60 && BANT_Score__c <= 90, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF( BANT_Score__c >90 && BANT_Score__c <= 120, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF( BANT_Score__c >120 && BANT_Score__c <= 150, "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif")))))), "rating")
CustomField.label: BANT Rating
